author: topix.com
title: Report: Some top baby monitors lack basic security features, can be hacked - SiliconValley.com
text:
There are 1 comment on the SiliconValley.com story from Yesterday, titled Report: Some top baby monitors lack basic security features, can be hacked . In it, SiliconValley.com reports that:
Several of the top Internet-connected baby monitors lack basic security features, making them vulnerable to hackers, according to new report from a cybersecurity firm. The researchers found security problems and design flaws in all of the cameras they tested.
Join the discussion below, or Read more at SiliconValley.com.
